Topic.Title: Adding image from my own computer

Posts.EditableText: I'm looking for a way to apply images to my squiffy game without them being first uploaded to an online source. Is there any way to put pictures direct from my own computer? Quest allows me to upload, this is handy. Am I out of luck with squiffy?
Posts.HTML: I'm looking for a way to apply images to my squiffy game without them being first uploaded to an online source. Is there any way to put pictures direct from my own computer? Quest allows me to upload, this is handy. Am I out of luck with squiffy?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello Piddles.

Squiffy don't allow to upload a picture, but you can upload the image to any repository and link then using img html tag for link the file in your game.
